FuncDef: The remove command deletes the specified file from the SFTP server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the file name.
It is a string data type. The absolute path of the file range is from 1 to 1060 characters. It contains the alphanumeric and special characters.

Examples: Are you sure to remove it?(Y/N): Y
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can delete a maximum of 10 files at a time.
